attributes.action: Ban Fred Phelps from the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a week when a Dutch politician is refused entry on the grounds of 'threatening community security' it smacks of hypocrisy to we allow Fred Phelps into the UK to push his "God Hates Fags" message.  We the undersigned demand a common approach to all those who preach hate.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
